content.html: You know that guy with the really bad takes? The one whose YouTube videos you're hate-watching? The one whose Tweets you re-broadcast with your epic takedowns? The one who you're screenshotting? Here a 10 second video that shows what your engagement looks like to his advertisers
content.value:
You know that guy with the really bad takes? The one whose YouTube videos you're hate-watching? The one whose Tweets you re-broadcast with your epic takedowns? The one who you're screenshotting?

Here a 10 second video that shows what your engagement looks like to his advertisers
